downloadTitle: Office 365 mapping of CSA Security, Compliance and Privacy Cloud Control Matrix requirements
downloadDescription: These White Papers describe how Office 365, Windows Azure, and Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online fulfill the security, compliance and risk management requirements as defined by the Cloud Security Alliance, Cloud Control Matrix.

downloadFile.name: Office 365 mapping of CSA Security Compliance and Privacy Cloud Control Matrix requirements_FINALv2final_final.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/7/4/9/749df9e9-4357-4a73-8fd8-9602b1f7a2e1/Office 365 mapping of CSA Security Compliance and Privacy Cloud Control Matrix requirements_FINALv2final_final.docx

detailsSection:
The Cloud Security Alliance published the Cloud Control Matrix, to support consumers in the evaluation of cloud services and to identify questions prudent to have answered before moving to cloud services.  In response to this publication, Microsoft has created this document to outline how we meet the suggested principals and mapped them to the International Standards Organization (ISO) 27001:2005 and ISO 27002.
With this standardized response we would like to empower customers with in-depth information to evaluate different offerings in the market place today.
detailsSection_file_name: Office 365 mapping of CSA Security Compliance and Privacy Cloud Control Matrix requirements_FINALv2final_final.docx
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
